job_tasks.phrase: Bepaal samen met de oprichters de technologische koers van ons Shopify-platform
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the need to understand and set the technological direction in collaboration with founders, aligning with business strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: zet CI/CD, testing en codekwaliteit hoog in het vaandel
job_tasks.justification: While related to technical execution, prioritizing code quality and testing supports business goals of reliable and maintainable software.

job_tasks.phrase: prioriteiten te stellen die aansluiten bij onze ambitieuze doelen
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to aligning technical efforts with business objectives and goals.

job_tasks.phrase: Verken en integreer LLM's en AI om je eigen werk of onze interne workflows om bedrijfsprocessen en klantervaringen te verbeteren.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions exploring and integrating LLMs and AI for process and experience improvement, which falls under model application.
Dify is a platform for building LLM applications and managing LLM flows, directly related to model implementation and orchestration.

job_tasks.phrase: Neem het voortouw in de technische ontwikkeling van ons Shopify Plus e-commerceplatform over zes domeinen.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a broad responsibility for the technical development of an e-commerce platform.

job_tasks.phrase: Hands-on development: Je werkt aan front- en backend, integreert met externe systemen
job_tasks.justification: This clearly describes core software development activities across full-stack development and system integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt en verbetert features die direct waarde toevoegen.
job_tasks.justification: Building and improving features is a fundamental software development task.
CI/CD and E2E testing are integral parts of the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: zorg voor betrouwbare code door middel van geautomatiseerde tests en code reviews
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring reliable code through automated tests and code reviews are standard software development practices.
React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces, a core part of front-end software development.
While broad, implementing best practices in a technical context often includes operational aspects like CI/CD and robust deployment.
CI/CD pipelines are central to MLOps and modern software deployment practices.
Google Cloud services like BigQuery and Dataform are often used for data pipeline orchestration and management, which overlaps with MLOps principles.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken en beslissen: Werk nauw samen met een klein multidisciplinair team om prioriteiten te stellen
of je nu jong of ervaren bent, jouw praktische skills en drive zijn leidend
Leiden en innoveren: Neem het voortouw in de technische ontwikkeling
Je bouwt en verbetert features die direct waarde toevoegen.
Leiden en innoveren: Neem het voortouw in de technische ontwikkeling van ons Shopify Plus e-commerceplatform over zes domeinen.

Verken en integreer LLM's en AI om je eigen werk of onze interne workflows om bedrijfsprocessen en klantervaringen te verbeteren. Hoewel dit niet het hoofdbestanddeel van je rol is, waarderen we enthousiasme en initiatief op dit gebied.
Je neemt verantwoordelijkheid, krijgt alle ruimte om beslissingen te nemen

classification.rationale: The role involves developing and integrating LLMs and AI for business improvements, alongside hands-on full-stack software development. While there's a significant software engineering component, the explicit mention of LLM integration and tools like Dify leans it towards a GenAI focus, albeit not as the primary responsibility.
